channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How J. Crew’s CIO Used AI To Supercharge The Brand’s Comeback
item.description: Five years ago, J. Crew filed for bankruptcy. Thanks in part to its technology initiatives, the company is now making a steady comeback.

item.title: A Surprising Update About ‘The Beast In Me’ Season 2 On Netflix
item.description: Will The Beast in Me get a season 2? There's a new update on that front that is not exactly what most would be expecting from the series.

item.title: Trump Organization Announces Maldives Resort—And Offers Investors Stakes Via Crypto
item.description: The luxury property will be called the Trump International Hotel Maldives and is set to launch in late 2028.

item.title: Good News For Consultants. Google CEO: No Company Is Immune To AI
item.description: AI is reshaping every workflow, and Sundar Pichai, Google’s CEO, warns that no company is immune. An opportunity for tool builder, workflow designer a...

item.title: Cloudflare Outage Latest: Spotify, X, ChatGPT And Many Other Sites Down
item.description: Just weeks after the Amazon Web Services outage took down much of the internet, it seems a technical problem with Cloudflare is causing problems onlin...
